Title: Ben-Hur
Overview: A falsely accused nobleman survives years of slavery to take vengeance on his best friend who betrayed him.
Tagline: First to finish. Last to die.
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), Sean Daniel Company, LightWorkers Media
Cast: Jack Huston, Toby Kebbell, Rodrigo Santoro
